    My Personal Website

    Using Jekyll and Github Pages I created my personal website from scratch, Its an ongoing project and features will be added soon

    Sangoshthi: Phase - 2

    An extension to the project Sangoshthi, where new features like tutorials and notifications added to the application.

    Video Cut N Trim

    An Android application with a simple user interface for ASHA workers, where they can create and edit stories using image, audio and video.

    Sangoshthi: Phase - 1

    An Android application that combines Internet and IVR technology to host real time training sessions with the Community Health Workers (CHW).

    Distributed System for Collecting Health Data using Mobile Devices

    Used Open Data Kit (ODK) platform for creating, deployment, collection and analysis of large scale data from geographically and culturally distributed people.

    User Study Framework

    Created an Android application framework to collect all the stats and user usability data of the 3 apps, Numerical, Word and Image dynamic password protection.

    ConnectBook Social Networking Website

    A mini social networking site with all social networking functionalities. Used Java Design Patterns along with frameworks like spring and bootstrap.

    BookXchange

    App for adding location stamped books for exchanging it with other users. Google and Facebook Api used. Map Api, Barcode Integraion, Amazon Search Api used

    Muster: A Chat Application

    An Android chat application with features like registration through 2-step verification, friends and contacts list, group chat, broadcast and one to one chat.

    PopMov - Popular Movies

    A responsive android application that fetches data from TheMovieDB api and show data to users using grid layout in cardview.
